quest.name: Ant Juice
journal: Ranulf wants to help the Barber.
objectives: Scatter the fine powder at the designated location and obtain a bottle of antlion secretion from the antlion ambusher.
Deliver the bottle of antlion secretion to Ranulf.

dialogue.name: RANULF
dialogue.text: Think you'd be able to lend me a hand?

dialogue.name: RANULF
dialogue.text: I've been trying to gather supplies for the Barber. While I've managed to get some blankets and bandages, I've not been able to procure any disinfectant. That's what I need your help forâ”€I want you to bring me a bottle of antlion secretion.

dialogue.name: RANULF
dialogue.text: I'll collect the other ingredients I need. I just need you to slay an antlion.

dialogue.name: RANULF
dialogue.text: Only the antlions that dwell beneath the earth secrete the kind of liquid I need. Use this to draw them to the surface.

dialogue.name: RANULF
dialogue.text: It's a powder made of crushed ants, their favorite food. Scatter it anywhere they're known to dwell and you'll be faced with one in no time at all.

dialogue.name: RANULF
dialogue.text: Head to Virdjala in the Fringes. You'll not struggle to find an antlion there.

dialogue.name: RANULF
dialogue.text: Scatter that powder in Virdjala and slay any antlions that come to the surface. Don't forget to collect the liquid they secrete!

dialogue.name: RANULF
dialogue.text: Exactly what I needed. I'll be able to make enough disinfectant to last a while with this.

dialogue.name: RANULF
dialogue.text: Even the smallest of wounds can be fatal if they become infected. We can't let the Barber run out of the stuff.
